footer.main-text: We are working to make using the platform as convenient as possible. You can help us become better

no-notifications: You don't have any notifications yet

validation.confirm-password: The new password must not match the old one
validation.confirm-password-requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character
validation.new-email-requirements: New email should not be the same as the old email
validation.items-requirements: At least one item is required
